scripts.package:all: npm run package:pad && npm run package:pad-mode=magicWindow && npm run package:fold && npm run package:pad-compatibility=yudi-device-code && npm run package:pad-compatibility=sheng-device-code && npm run package:pad-compatibility=general-tiramisu && npm run package:pad-compatibility=general-upsideDownCake  && mpm run package:pad-compatibility=hyperos-based-on-tiramisu && mpm run package:pad-compatibility=miui-based-on-tiramisu && npm run package:pad-compatibility=pipa-device-code && npm run package:pad-compatibility=liuqin-device-code && npm run package:pad-compatibility=dagu-device-code && npm run netdisk
scripts.package-ext:all: npm run package:pad && npm run package-ext:pad && npm run package:pad-mode=magicWindow && npm run package-ext:pad-mode=magicWindow && npm run package:fold && npm run package-ext:fold && npm run package:pad-compatibility=yudi-device-code && npm run package-ext:pad-compatibility=yudi-device-code && npm run package:pad-compatibility=sheng-device-code && npm run package-ext:pad-compatibility=sheng-device-code && npm run package:pad-compatibility=general-tiramisu && npm run package-ext:pad-compatibility=general-tiramisu && npm run package:pad-compatibility=general-upsideDownCake && npm run package-ext:pad-compatibility=general-upsideDownCake && package:pad-compatibility=hyperos-based-on-tiramisu && npm run package-ext:pad-compatibility=hyperos-based-on-tiramisu && package:pad-compatibility=miui-based-on-tiramisu && npm run package-ext:pad-compatibility=miui-based-on-tiramisu && npm run package:pad-compatibility=pipa-device-code && npm run package-ext:pad-compatibility=pipa-device-code && npm run package:pad-compatibility=liuqin-device-code && npm run package-ext:pad-compatibility=liuqin-device-code && npm run package:pad-compatibility=dagu-device-code && npm run package-ext:pad-compatibility=dagu-device-code && npm run netdisk
scripts.package-ext:sothx: npm run package:pad && npm run package:pad-mode=magicWindow && npm run package:fold && npm run package:pad-compatibility=yudi-device-code && npm run package:pad-compatibility=sheng-device-code && npm run package:pad-compatibility=general-tiramisu && npm run package:pad-compatibility=general-upsideDownCake && npm run package:pad-compatibility=hyperos-based-on-tiramisu && npm run package:pad-compatibility=miui-based-on-tiramisu && npm run package:pad-compatibility=pipa-device-code && npm run package:pad-compatibility=liuqin-device-code && npm run package:pad-compatibility=dagu-device-code && npm run package-ext:pad:sothx && npm run netdisk:sothx
scripts.package-ext:pad:sothx: cross-env gulp package --use_platform pad  --mi_os_version 2 --use_ext true --netdisk_desc sothx
